li.label: Thrown into the Pit of Despair.
li.description: I was thrown into a dark, terrible pit. I suffered unimaginable horrors and I didn't even emerge from it being Batman.

li.label: Threw prisoner into the Pit.
li.description: Should we be treating prisoners this way? I mean, it's called the Pit of Despair for a reason...

li.label: I love the Pit of Despair.
li.description: That will teach that prisoner to behave.
